The OBO Foundry

Sneak peek at the new OBO Foundry site


This is a sneak preview of the new OBO Foundry website. The site is still in development, so please be patient with any issues. You can report any issues on the issue tracker.

The new site incorporates a number of improvements from the old legacy site:

  • An improved ontology table
  • A richer ontology registry that allows us to capture more information about each ontology
  • A more modern underlying infrastructure (GitHub pages) that allow us to be more responsive ( here is the source ).
  • The ability for ontology maintainers to edit their own metadata and submit pull requests
  • Customizable ontology pages -- see for example the page for the Human Phenotype Ontology
  • Better integration with OntoBee and other ontology browsers

Next Steps

The old legacy site site will soon be decomissioned (mostly likely before Aug 24 2015, when google code becomes readonly).

In the interim time, ontology metadata will not be edited in the legacy system (ontologies.txt). Instead, ontology metadata can be edited on this site. Any edits made here will be preserved.

To follow progress, subscribe to this issue

For now, please try the site and provide feedback.

August 8, 2015 |
